cab.content: THIS DO OUMEHT IS THE PROPERTY OF HI BRITANNIC MAJESTY';b GOVERNMENT) 3 E C R E T.0.?. 205 (27),.Copy No. i:,i\JCABINET.AIR RAIDS PRECAUTIONS.a uthority for cons ultation and co-operation outs ide Government.circles.The undermentioned Committee of Imperial Defence Proceedings and Memoranda are circulated, "by direction of the Prime Minister- to be noted at the meeting of the Cabinet to be held on \iednesday the 20th instant at 11.30 a.m.(i) Extract from Minutes of the 229th Meeting of the Committee of Imperial Defence. (This Minute, being in draft form only, is subject to correction).(ii) Interim Report of the Sub-Committee on Air Raids Precautions. (153-A. )(iii) Extract from Official Report of Parliamentary Debates. (154-A).(Signed) M.P.A. HANKEY,Secretary to the Cabinet.Whitehall Gardens, SvW.l. 18th July, 1927.NOTE:- The above mentioned documents, with the " exception of (i), are not attached in the case" of those Ministers who are regular-recipients of C.I.D. Papers.
